sentences.en: A large, shiny black limo pulled up to the curb.
sentences.cn: 一辆闪亮的黑色豪华大轿车在路边停下。

sentences.en: Avoid pans with a shiny, reflective base as the heat will be reflected back.
sentences.cn: 不要使用锅底光亮、能反射热的平底锅，因为热量会被反射回去。

sentences.en: He puts grease on his hair to make It'shiny.
sentences.cn: 他往头发上擦油,使之发亮.

sentences.en: He saw a shiny green beetle on a leaf.
sentences.cn: 我看见树叶上有一只闪闪发光的绿色甲虫.

sentences.en: Her blonde hair was shiny and clean.
sentences.cn: 她的金发干净而有光泽。

sentences.en: Her hair was thick and shiny.
sentences.cn: 她的头发浓密且有光泽。

sentences.en: His face was sallow and shiny with sweat.
His skin was tanned and smooth and shiny with sweat.

sentences.en: Hoban's brown eyes now dominated his face , alert, concerned, and shiny.

sentences.en: It was dark and shiny, and was wrapped in silver paper.
sentences.cn: 它暗黑晶亮, 还包着银纸.

sentences.en: She gazed proudly at the shiny buckles on her shoes.
sentences.cn: 她骄傲地注视着鞋上闪亮的扣环.

sentences.en: The floor has been scrubbed clean and shiny.
The road was shiny with puddles, but the rain was at an end.
sentences.cn: 马路上到处是水洼，闪着光，不过雨停了。
